job description:
3M is seeking a IT Data Warehouse Analyst for the Business Transformation & Information Technology organization located in Maplewood, MN. At 3M, you can apply your talent in bold ways that matter. Here, you go.

Job Summary:

The person hired for the position of SAP HANA Data Warehouse Analyst will work with the global process teams to build and deploy standardized global reporting and analytical solutions as part of the Polaris project.

This position provides an opportunity to transition from other private, public, government or military environments to a 3M career.

Primary Responsibilities include but are not limited to the following:

SAP HANA Data Warehouse Analyst for support of the SAP Supply Chain or Customer Facing areas including Make To Deliver or Logistics Execution or Order To Cash areas.
  • Design, develop and test HANA models/Business Warehouse extracts from SAP based on a functional design specification
  • Analyze, design, code/develop and implement changes to resolve break/fix issues to resolve and close tickets during both testing cycle of project and in production.
  • Understand the functionality of relevant process area and data that will be required to Build, Test and implementation
  • Responsible for coordination of all deliverables in their area of HANA/BW and on time delivery per release timelines
Basic Qualifications:
  • Currently possess or in the last year of pursuing a bachelors degree, or higher, in in Computer Science, Management Information Systems or Analytics from an accredited university
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Current cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher on a 4.0 scale
  • Exposure to SAP tools and technology or taken course work on SAP technology
  • Previous internship experience in SAP implementations or previous working experience in Information Technology
  • Working knowledge on SQL queries
  • Self-motivated with the ability to prioritize, meet deadlines, and manage changing priorities
  • Excellent interpersonal, problem-solving skills with the ability to work independently and in a team environment
  • Have a strong background and interest in technology
Location: Maplewood, MN

Travel: May include up to 10% domestic/international travel

Relocation: Is authorized

Must be legally authorized to work in country of employment without sponsorship for employment visa status (e.g., H1B status).
